news.title: On this day in 1977: Thin Lizzy released 'Dancing in the Moonlight (It's Caught Me in Its Spotlight)'
news.summary: On July 29, 1977, Thin Lizzy released 'Dancing In The Moonlight (It's Caught Me In Its Spotlight)' The single went on to feature on the band's acclaimed eighth album, Bad Reputation,

news.title: Hayley Williams surpirse releases 17 new songs on personal website
news.summary: To access the new material, listeners must first purchase the new shade Ego from Williams' hair dye brand.

news.title: Michael Kiwanuka pulls out of All Together Now due to "continued illness"
news.summary: Michael Kiwanuka is unable to perform at ATN and other summer festivals

news.title: Inhaler, Maverick Sabre, Paul Weller and Primal Scream to play Gig For Gaza in London
news.summary: They will play Troxy on October 17.

news.title: Jacoténe: “It’s my responsibility to be honest, even though being honest is hard"
news.summary: Following the release of her excellent debut EP Untitled (Read My Mind), Australian singer-songwriter Jacoténe discusses travel, growth, and being inspired by Lauryn Hill and Aretha Franklin.

news.title: Chappell Roan announces new single ‘The Subway’
news.summary: The new track comes out on August 1.
